title: Revamping India's Education with Tradition and Innovation: A Bold Vision
description: Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan outlined the National Education Policy's (NEP-2020) aim to integrate Indian ethos into education, leveraging artificial intelligence. He emphasized Madhya Pradesh's role in retaining cultural continuity and highlighted the necessity for community involvement, skill development, and educational accountability to position India globally.

title: There's a new face in Hollywood, generated by AI
description: Tilly Norwood is unlike any other aspiring TV or movie star: Tilly is entirely generated by artificial intelligence. What might that mean for the media industry?
